quoteFirst: "The ball's opened," exclaimed several voices, when at
quoteLast: the sound of a furious cannonade was borne to the ears of the _Vindictive's_ company.
title: The Thick of the Fray at Zeebrugge, April 1918
author: Westerman, Percy F. (Percy Francis), 1876-1959; Wigfull, W. Edward, 1875-1944 [Illustrator]
